5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Whoever performs ablution on Friday, it is well and good for him, and he has done what is obligatory for him. But whoever takes a bath, bath is better.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the concession for that
